definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to have a promising future/to have bright prospects

sentences.english: The application of chemical oil displacement agents for high temperature and salinity reservoir was prospected.
sentences.chinese: 分析了高温高盐油藏用化学驱油剂的应用前景。

sentences.english: For example, an electronic book for $30 could be sold to your prospects.
sentences.chinese: 例如，电子书籍可以出售给你30元的前景。

sentences.english: Finally, we give the prospect of VDSL.
sentences.chinese: 最后，展望了VDSL的发展前景。

sentences.english: In your opinion, what is the future of the foreign-funded bank in China?
sentences.chinese: 你认为外资银行今后在中国的发展前景如何？

sentences.english: Compared with numerical control, its broad future in application is illustrated.
sentences.chinese: 并与数控机械加工比较，说明它适用的广泛前景。

sentences.english: This process will certainly open up broad prospects for theoretical innovation.
sentences.chinese: 这一过程必将为理论创新开辟广阔前景。

sentences.english: Programmability is the future of electronic system design.
sentences.chinese: 可编程性是电子系统设计的前景。

sentences.english: This paper also viewed the future of the application of orchid industries.
sentences.chinese: 并对生物技术在兰花产业中的应用前景进行了展望。

sentences.english: Transgenic plant as plant-derived vaccine is prospect in the production of FMD vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 利用转基因植物生产植物源性的口蹄疫疫苗前景广阔。

sentences.english: Chapter II is the foregrounding of the language symbols.
sentences.chinese: 第二章语言符号前景化。

sentences.english: Finally, prospects of future development of seepage detection technology are presented.
sentences.chinese: 最后，对渗漏检测技术的发展前景作了展望。

sentences.english: There are wide application areas for Internet-based teleoperation systems.
sentences.chinese: 基于互联网的遥操作系统具有广阔的应用前景。

sentences.english: The prospect of bankruptcy of his company beetled over the general manager.
sentences.chinese: 总经理面临他的公司破产的阴暗前景。

sentences.english: "Crossing" during the struggle for the self-transcendence, "Mori" for a better future.
sentences.chinese: “渡”为自我超越的奋斗过程，“森”为美好前景。

sentences.english: This illustrates that this method has good prospect in practical positive-analysis application.
sentences.chinese: 从而说明本方法有实际正演应用的广阔前景。

sentences.english: It will be widely used in development of offshore Yuedong heavy oil reservoir in the future.
sentences.chinese: 在海上月东稠油油藏开发中，将具有广泛的应用前景。

definition: outlook/prospect/to look ahead/to look forward to
to regard as having good prospects
to have a promising future/to have bright prospects
